InLine.AdTitle: Rewarded Video with Playable End Card
InLine.Description: 30s video followed by MRAID playable end card

Companion.HTMLResource:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no">
<style>
*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}
html,body{width:100%;height:100%;overflow:hidden;background:#000}
#playable-frame{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;border:none}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<script src="mraid.js"></script>
<iframe id="playable-frame" src="https://tech-iion.github.io/advertiser-creatives/allkindsLandscape/" allowfullscreen></iframe>
<script>
(function(){
  var CLICK_URL='https://allkinds.com/au/';
  function init(){
    if(typeof mraid==='undefined'){window.addEventListener('click',function(){window.open(CLICK_URL,'_blank')});return}
    if(mraid.getState()==='loading'){mraid.addEventListener('ready',ready)}else{ready()}
  }
  function ready(){console.log('[MRAID] Ready')}
  window.addEventListener('message',function(e){
    if(e.data&&(e.data.type==='clickthrough'||e.data.action==='cta')){
      if(typeof mraid!=='undefined'){mraid.open(CLICK_URL)}else{window.open(CLICK_URL,'_blank')}
    }
  });
  init();
})();
</script>
</body>
</html>
